name: Shift the Ground
overview: Primary Objectives are worth more Victory Points if they are controlled by a figure with a higher Claim value.
primary_objectives: Each Primary Objective controlled at the end of the round is worth 1 Victory Point, plus 1 additional Victory Point for each point of Claim the controlling figure has (e.g., a figure with 3 Claim scores 4 Victory Points).
secondary_objectives: Each Secondary Objective controlled at the end of the round is worth 1 Victory Point.
